channel.title: Rafed's Blog on RaBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Rafed's Blog on RaBlog

item.title: Which martial art should I learn
item.description: Choosing the best martial art for you to learn can be difficult when you don’t know the differences between them and especially when you have options to choose from. Here goes a short review on which martial art you should learn.

item.title: How to win Judo competitions
item.description: If you have a competition ahead and you have no idea how you should train, this guide is for you. These tips apply whether it’s for a dojo fight or a competition. However, this is mostly intended for beginners who do not have much experience with Judo fights and have upcoming contests.

item.title: Judo: the gentle way
item.description: Judo is a discipline that involves using grappling and leverage to unbalance the opponent. Originating from Japan, Judo was founded by Jigoro Kano in 1882. Judo means gentle way. A Judo practitioner is called a Judoka.

item.title: Karate: The way of the empty hand
item.description: Karate is a martial art discipline that involves kicking, striking, and defensive blocking. It is practiced as an art (budo), self-defense and a sport. Originating from Japan, Karate was founded by Gichin Funakoshi in 1902. Karate means empty hand.

item.title: A brief introduction to martial arts
item.description: Since the beginning of civilization, people have fought and engaged in war. They devised techniques to take leverage over their opponents and be the victor. This is why the art of fighting started to form and evolve.

item.title: তোমার জন্য নীলচে তারার একটুখানি আলো (Chords)
item.description: D E B F#m তোমার জন্য নীলচে তারার একটুখানি আলো D E B F#m ভোরের রং রাতে মিশে কালো . . . D E B F#m কাঠ গোলাপের সাদার মায়া মিশিয়ে দিয়ে ভাবি D E B F#m আবছা নীল তোমার লাগে ভালো। .

item.title: Happy Birthday to you
item.description: Base key: C A E Happy Birthday to you E A Happy Birthday to you A7 D Happy Birthday dear Johnny A E A Happy Birthday to you

item.title: আমার পরান যাহা চায় (Chords)
item.description: Cm G Cm আমার পরান যাহা চায় D# F D# তুমি তাই, তুমি তাই গো G7 Cm আমার পরান যাহা চায় Cm D# তোমা ছাড়া আর এ জগতে Cm F D# মোর কেহ নাই, কিছু নাই গো G7 Cm আমার পরান যাহা চায় G7 Cm তুমি সুখ যদি নাহি পাও G Cm D# F যাও সুখের সন্ধানে যা--ও.
